function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Possible transmission of contagious diseases through wastewater and surface water","Impact":"Potential spread of contagious diseases throughout the community","Mitigation":"Implementation of advanced wastewater treatment technologies","Technologies":"Advanced filtration systems, UV disinfection, chlorination","People":"General community, wastewater treatment workers, public health officials","Owner":"Government agencies, wastewater treatment facilities"},{"Description":"International collaboration leading to global propagation of contagious diseases","Impact":"Risk of spreading contagious diseases across international borders","Mitigation":"Establishment of international guidelines and standards for wastewater monitoring and treatment","Technologies":"Collaborative data sharing platforms, international regulatory frameworks, advanced detection technologies","People":"International organizations, government agencies, research institutions","Owner":"International governing bodies, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Exposure to endogenous biomarkers may reveal information about community health status and disease prevalence","Impact":"Risk of revealing sensitive health information and disease prevalence data","Mitigation":"Implementation of strict privacy regulations and data protection measures","Technologies":"Encryption methods, anonymization techniques, secure data storage","People":"Community members, public health officials, researchers","Owner":"Government agencies, research institutions"}]}
